CREATE TABLE appointments (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, appointment_date DATE, time_slot VARCHAR(20), status VARCHAR(20))</t><s>alter table patients add column email varchar(50)</s>

CREATE TABLE doctors (doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), specialization VARCHAR(50), hospital_id INT, experience_years INT, contact_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE appointments (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, appointment_date DATE, time_slot VARCHAR(20), status VARCHAR(20))</t><s>alter table doctors rename column contact_number to phone_number</s>

CREATE TABLE appointments (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, appointment_date DATE, time_slot VARCHAR(20), status VARCHAR(20))</t><s>ALTER TABLE appointments DROP COLUMN status</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE medications (medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, medication_name VARCHAR(50), dosage VARCHAR(20), frequency VARCHAR(20), start_date DATE, end_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE appointments (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, appointment_date DATE, time_slot VARCHAR(20), status VARCHAR(20))

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), diagnosis VARCHAR(100), admission_date DATE, discharge_date DATE)</t><s>alter table appointments drop column status</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>ALTER TABLE healthcare_provider ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))</t><s>alter table healthcare_provider add column email varchar(50)</s>

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))</t><s>ALTER TABLE healthcare_provider ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)</s>

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>alter table healthcare_provider add column email varchar(50)</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

<t>CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>alter table healthcare_provider add column email varchar(50)</s>

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))</t><s>ALTER TABLE healthcare_provider ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)</s>

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>ALTER TABLE patient ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)</s>

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))</t><s>alter table patient add column email varchar(50)</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))</t><s>ALTER TABLE patient ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>ALTER TABLE appointment ADD COLUMN appointment_time TIME</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))</t><s>alter table appointment add column appointment_time time</s>

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>alter table appointment add column appointment_time time</s>

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), provider_type VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))</t><s>ALTER TABLE appointment ADD COLUMN appointment_time TIME</s>

CREATE TABLE insurance (insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, insurance_name VARCHAR(50), insurance_type VARCHAR(20), provider_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>alter table appointment add column appointment_time time</s>

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))</t><s>alter table appointment add column appointment_time time</s>

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE medical_record (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, record_date DATETIME, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))

CREATE TABLE appointment (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, provider_id INT, appointment_date DATETIME, appointment_type VARCHAR(20), appointment_status VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id), FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_provider(provider_id))</t><s>alter table appointment add column appointment_time time</s>

CREATE TABLE patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), patient_gender VARCHAR(10), patient_dob DATE, patient_address VARCHAR(100), patient_phone VARCHAR(15))</t><s>ALTER TABLE appointment ADD COLUMN appointment_time TIME</s>
